column1: Qarah Zia od Din (Persian: قره ضياڈالدين‎; also Romanized as Qarah Ẕīā' od Dīn
column4: and Qareh Zīyā ’Eddīn; also known as Ghareh Ziya’ Oddin
column5: Qaraziadin and Qara Zīa ud Dīn) is a city and capital of Chaypareh County
column7: Iran.  It lies in the northern part of the county
column8: 39 kilometres (24 mi) from Khoy.  At the 2018 census
